ygData.subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars
ygData.msgSnippet: Ursa Major/DarkMouse ... jumped, tucked and rolled out of the way of three of the missles.  One missle caught her and she went flying in the air and landed.

Ursa Major/DarkMouse

::Ursa Major::
jumped, tucked and rolled out of the way of three of the missles.  One 
missle caught her and she went flying in the air and landed.  "OHH, Man that 
hurt." She looked at the damage.  It wan't too bad.  She had plenty of 
schorched hide and a few wires showing, but not too bad.  She returned fire 
on Bumblebee.

::DarkMouse:: The shots came within inches of her as she landed. She was 
propped up against a tree just sitting at it's base breathing very heavily.  
She couldn't move if she tried.  She was so worn out and too injured to do 
much more.  All she could do was hope the Matrix would show her mercy.

----------Original Message----------
>From: KSLawdogg@...
>Reply-To: nbwrpg@egroups.com
>To: nbwrpg@egroups.com
>Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars
>Date: Sun, 18 Jun 2000 13:47:25 EDT
>Anubis/Hades/Nemesis Enforcer/The Oblitercons/Unitron/Serpentor/Koga
>Shuko/Shockwave/Bumblebee:
>
>
>
>Hades leapt slamming Anubis out of the way of Iron Raptor.  They both ran
>like Hell for the other Dieties who had gathered.  Upon reaching them:
>
>"We're ready!  LET'S KICK MAXI TAILGATE!"
>
>---
>
>Nemesis saw Dinobot's optics charge, firing his own shot of optic lasers to
>intercept the blast.  Jumping up quickly, he transformed to his beast mode,
>activating the boosters in his feet, he blasted off into the air.
>
>---
>
>Shockwave saw the massive form of Iron Raptor.  "Illogical beast modes."
>Bringing up his targeting scanners from 120 ft in the air, he got a lock.
>Firing four missiles and a burst of twenty rapid lasers down at Iron 
>Raptor's
>midsection.
>
>---
>
>Scavenger saw Dinobot begin to turn towards him with a weapon.  "Slag!" he
>yelled, going into a quick reverse, explosions in front of him sent him 
>into
>a flip, landing on his tires with a crunch.
>
>---
>
>Serpentor and Koga Shuko heard Cyber Claw screamed.  The kick sent Shuko
>slamming into the tree.
>
>--
>
>Serpentor laughed.  "Stupid." was the one word he said before throwing his
>energon sword blade first at Cyber Claw's chest, rolling to the left and
>standing, his plasma rifle raised.  "Megatron?"
>
>Koga laughed.  "Oh, yeah, he'll answer your questions.  Evidently you 
>didn't
>know him.  He's been dead for months, and only now reincarnated by my
>brilliant technology.  And the same will happen to you, without the 
>cloning!"
>he yelled, taking out his sword and getting in a fighting stance.
>
>======
>
>Bumblebee swerved to the left, catching a few shots in his side.  Raising
>both launchers, he fired a total of four stinger missiles off at Ursa 
>Major,
>an optic blast off at Dark Mouse as he saw her bite Transantulas.
